パッケージ org.sxb.i18n

SXB预置国际化类包 * Example:
1: Create resource file "demo_zh_CN.properties" content with: msg=你好 Sxb!

参照先: 説明

  • クラスの概要 
    クラス 説明
    I18n
    I18N support.
    I18nInterceptor
    I18nInterceptor is used to change the locale by request para, and it is also switch the view or pass Res object to the view.
    Res
    Res is used to get the message value from the ResourceBundle of the related Locale.

パッケージorg.sxb.i18nの説明

SXB预置国际化类包 * Example:
1: Create resource file "demo_zh_CN.properties" content with: msg=你好 Sxb! 你好{0}!
Create resource file "demo_en_US.properties" content with: msg=Hello Sxb! Hello {0}!

2: Res res = I18n.use("demo", "zh_CN");
res.get("msg"); // return value: 你好 Sxb! 你好{0}!
res.format("msg", "孙日昌"); // return value: 你好 Sxb! 你好孙日昌!

res = I18n.use("demo", "en_US");
res.get("msg"); // return value: Hello Sxb! Hello{0}!
res.format("msg", "Jeffson"); // return value: Hello Sxb! Hello Jeffson!
作成者:
Jeffson
